website_summaries.verdict: The 3M Mobile Projector MP300 offers a more than usable image, with a native WVGA (854 by 480) resolution, but it can't connect to a VGA port or read files from a USB memory key.
pros: Same brightness whether running on AC power or on its rechargeable battery
cons: Only input connector is an MHL-equipped HDMI port
Only included cable is HDMI to HDMI

customer_reviews.title: Amazing, Amazing, Amazing.
customer_reviews.text: This projector is amazing. I also ordered a separate HDMI cable for $11 and was able to connect this projector to my iPad. I laid in bed, turned the lights off and projected Facebook on my white walls. The projector has a built in speaker but to enhance the sound I just turned on my Bose Bluetooth speaker and it felt like I was in a movie theater. I will be using this to teach my college course because the classroom they assigned me to does not have a projector. I am so excited. You must charge the projector first before turning it on. It runs for three hours once fully charged.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: If you use some older computer, you will need an adapter. It can be easily found in RadioShack. I wish the company had put it in the package. Works well, is small and light. The picture is fine. If you are using it for a presentation you might need to focus it a couple of times. I had three presentations with it. The audio quality is good and I was satisfied with the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Ada Taymoori

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our dorm movie nights
customer_reviews.text: I bought this projector for my dorm mates in college. A few times a week we connect the included HDMI cable to my Macbook, bluetooth stream the sound to my Big Jambox, and project movies onto our wall for some of the best nights of the year. The projector is extremely small, quiet, and doesn't overheat. We usually project in a dark room, so the lighting has been perfect. I don't have anything negative to say, I just wonder how long the lightbulb will last us. I really recommend this projector!
customer_reviews.author: SlipperyPenguin

customer_reviews.title: Powerless
customer_reviews.text: This might be a much better product than reflected by my one star rating. However, the item I received did not work. It would not light or seem to have a power source. I downloaded a manual but found nothing that offered any help in fixing the problem so I returned it for credit and purchased a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Milt Nuzum

customer_reviews.title: Returned Item
customer_reviews.text: It did not work out of the box so it was returned. Disappointed, but I know that this can happen. I didn't exchange it as I needed a projector so purchased one locally.
customer_reviews.author: H. Schloer

customer_reviews.title: crap
customer_reviews.text: so excited to get this to use for my aunt's wedding anniversary slide show. Well we sail tomorrow and this stupid thing did not even turn on. No power, no blinking, no nothing. I am so angry.
customer_reviews.author: C. Cordero

customer_reviews.title: It's just okay!
customer_reviews.text: It is small, lightweight and portable. However the recommended stand is terrible. This product is okay for an on-thefly presentation. The room must also be dark the lumens are not quite poweful enough to project crisp and clear in a well lit room. The focus action is not that great either. I do a lot of traveling and present materials to potential customers. This enablesme to get the job done but I am not overly satisfied. I expected a lot more out of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Jason F.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's easier to find just what I want with on line shopping. This product is just what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Linda P.

customer_reviews.title: No Roku Stick
customer_reviews.text: so I received my projector today, I was disappointed because there was no Roku stick. I purchased this item because I bought one in the past and it was stolen. What happened to the Roku stick that was provided in the past?
customer_reviews.author: csamue

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for fancy movie nights with the kids. I got the ipad attachment cable (purchased separately) and it was a cinch to steam movies that were stored on the ipad or to stream netflix. The kids were amazed and I was impressed with the clarity of the picture. We projected to our high ceilings and the picture was bright and crisp!
customer_reviews.author: Megan @ Tiny Orchard

customer_reviews.title: Great camping and sleepover projector for the kids
customer_reviews.text: Great camping and sleepover projector for the kids.The image is almost definitely smaller than you will expect, but the upside is the kids keep close and quiet. I have not had luck playing out of an iPad, so plan to use your laptop.
customer_reviews.author: B. Doctor

customer_reviews.title: Great for football games
customer_reviews.text: Bought my boyfriend one for christmas and it is amazing for football sundays!! We can't wait to host superbowl at our house on the 120" screen!! You MUST have speakers to connect....we have a soundbar with subwoofer and it sounds like we are at the game. Way better quality then I would have imagined for the price!!! A++++++
customer_reviews.author: Tonya foreman

customer_reviews.title: but there are far better ones on Amazon for even cheaper
customer_reviews.text: Ok projector, but there are far better ones on Amazon for even cheaper. The quality is standard definition and isn't a very bright image. Definitely need to watch in a dark room for best results.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: 3M MP300 Mobile Projector
feature_bullets: Palm-sized, plug n play projector with built-in speaker and audio out for external speakers or headphones
Simple plug n play interface to mirror tablets, laptops, and smartphones (adapter sold separately)
Bright enough for a variety of settings -60 Lumens (not designed for brightly lit environments)
Up to 3.5 hours of battery life per charge (or runs continuously on AC power). Turn the unit on by pressing the power button for 3-9 seconds before attempting to charge the unit for the first time.
Remote control and HDMI cord included
